info.name: qBittorrent Dark WebUI
info.description:
A dark theme for qBittorrent's webui. This theme was made and tested using qBittorrent 4.0's webui in Chrome and probably won't look as nice with previous versions (due to the new icon set included in the 4.0 release). To use this userstyle you will need to manually enter the address of your qBittorrent webui.

To make this theme I started with Techjar's "Dark Web UI for qBittorrent"( https://userstyles.org/styles/139837/dark-web-ui-for-qbittorrent) as a base and made many adjustments and additions from there.

For a larger screenshot see here: https://imgur.com/Lz02yQi/
info.additionalInfo:
19/12/17 Update - The latest version of qBittorrent fixed the broken flags in the peer list in Chrome. This update makes it so the brightness filter isn't applied to them. I'm not sure how this site handles updates to userstyles but this may require you to reconfigure the style to apply to your webui. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

If you'd like the brightness filter to apply to the flags find the "#filtersColumn img, #transferList_wrapper img, #desktopFooter img" css selector in the userstyle and add the ".flags" to the end (before the curly bracket), making it look like "#filtersColumn img, #transferList_wrapper img, #desktopFooter img, .flags".
